base_description: Rectangular gray camera with a black lens.
part_description: Includes a black circular lens on top left, concentric circles on front, rectangular body.
internal_interaction_description: The lens is positioned on the top left of the camera body, allowing light to enter and focus on the internal sensor. Concentric circles on the front may indicate a decorative element or a focus ring, enhancing the camera's functionality or design.
external_interaction_description: The camera interacts with users through its lens, capturing images when held and operated by a person. It can be connected to other devices for image transfer, and the design allows it to be portable, fitting into bags or pockets.
